education.details: In my Master’s in Software Engineering, I specialized in Agile Development, Software Architecture, and UX Design. I gained practical skills in creating scalable systems and ensuring software quality through rigorous testing. This education equipped me to design, develop, and maintain high-quality software in dynamic, collaborative environments.

During my Bachelor’s in Computer Science, I focused on Data Structures, Database Management, and Algorithms, gaining a solid foundation in efficient software development. I also studied Java, Android, C++, and Artificial Intelligence, enhancing my programming skills. The program included Business Management, providing insights into the intersection of technology and business.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Built and maintained responsive web apps using React, optimizing performance and enhancing user experience. Implemented state management (Redux, Context API) and modern React features to improve code scalability and stability.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Developed and maintained Java applications, enhancing functionality and performance. Assisted in translating business requirements into technical specifications and implemented solutions under senior developer guidance. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to troubleshoot and resolve software issues, ensuring code quality and reliability.

projects.title: Portfolio Webpage
projects.description: A portfolio site developed using Nest.js and TailwindCSS.

projects.title: Garden Reminder App
projects.description: A React Native (Expo) project for watering plants. The app allows users to schedule watering reminders and uses the Plant.id API to identify plants based on the image provided.

projects.title: VolunteerX Client
projects.description: VolunteerX is a localised social network for volunteers. It is a platform where we sync the innovative minds to resolve real-life problems and bring changes. Built with React Native, MapBox and GraphQL

projects.title: VolunteerX Server
projects.description: This project is the server-side backbone of a localized social network for volunteers, connecting innovative minds to solve real-world problems and drive change. Developed with Nest.js, Apollo GraphQL, Microservices, MongoDB, and Neo4j.

footer: Developed by Amil using Visual Studio Code. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Inspire by portfolio page by Brittany Chiang
